TopicTitle: Cannot Load/Start Campaigns. Freeze at "Pumping Sim Once"

Articles.Content: It still does not work for me, I have tried all of the steps and it is still not working

I am also freezing /crashing at pumping sim once. Log files show some errors

Failed to read raySampleCount data

D3d11 failed to create 2d texture d3d error 887a0005

Invalid pass number for Graphics.Blit

If your vessel is spinning faster and faster try turning SAS off.

 

Often SAS can get jittery and the only fix is a quick off and on again which usually smoothes it right out.

 

Also maybe it’s just due to playing KSP while it was still Alpha but I wouldn’t do any important burns in time warp.  Usually a burn to achieve orbit on the Mun isn’t that long.
I let my game sit for awhile but it was really slow

When I try to create a save for the first time, the loading screen gets stuck on the "Pumping Sim Once" stage and will not go past it. What is causing this and what should I do? The audio cuts in and out but stays on predominantly, so I assume that means it is TRYING to load something but is not able to.
Welcome to the forum @ChickenLentilSoup, you can try starting the game with KSP2_x64.exe or you can install this mod which will preserve the steam overlay.

8 hours ago, MRVIPER said:

It still does not work for me, I have tried all of the steps and it is still not working
 

Im in the the same boat. I hope there is a fix for it soon.

If you have the game on Steam, try verifying the game files? Maybe something wasn't installed correctly

  1. Right click the KSP 2 game from Steam
  2. From the drop down menu, select. Properties
  3. Select the. Local Files
  4. Wail for the files to verify and relaunch the game to see if it helps

Hello. Hope it could help. Sometime, game is correctly runs, sometime "pumping sim once" crash.

I put logs when working and logs when crashing.

[2 log file outputs snipped]

Welcome to the forum @jmbenito71, you have not done anything wrong it's just that posting really large text blocks like that causes issues for the forum software and members trying to view the content. Please upload your output files to a service like google drive or drop box and then link to them here in the forum. We apologize for any inconvenience.

On 2/24/2023 at 5:03 PM, komplexRS said:

Got past "Pumping Sim Once" by lowering game graphics settings. Was finally able to get the game to load by cutting down some of the game graphics settings to Med and also lowering resolution. Got into the VAB and started building but it crashed about 8 parts in. System is i7, 2070RTX, 16GB RAM and 1+TB free SSD space. Should be more than adequate to run this.

This solution helped for me! Thanks a lot!
I've seen some users say that launching the KSP2_x64.exe file directly from the game's install directory has helped (bypassing the Private Division launcher).
Wished it did,  it runs just freeze during last loading screen none of the fixes have worked so far about 11 different ways tries all are no goes so far

Please some help..  some mod o action i can use?
